Could Riot consider giving ranked matches the ability to pause (similar to Dota 2?)?

Has there been any considerations on increasing the punishment for leaving a match? One of the biggest ping killers is uploading, at least in my case my upload speed is like a tenth of my download speed. People can be using the net while I play and it's fine but then my bro has to decide to upload a YouTube video in 720p and I have to go metaphorically smack him in the head for it. That brings me to my main point if you start to lag don't just wait it out "Maybe if I play more it will magically disappear" no go find who/what is causing it and fix it quickly.
Downloads and stuff like that shouldn't cause any issue/lag for lol. If it is then its something else not the download that is the issue.
